channel.title: Sperm donation
channel.description:
This discussion came up with a friend recently, and I found it interesting.
What do you guys think of sperm donation? Would you ever donate sperm to a clinic whereby you would never know the child? Would you donate to someone you knew personally due to either their inability to conceive with their partner, or the fact that they're a same-sex couple -- despite the fact that you would know the child and the child would potentially be aware of you?
Just a little something to steer the user-base away from drugs and politicians.

item.title: Sperm donation
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Elijah, post:26, topic:311626”]That whole scenario just seems awful to me. You have people that obviously aren’t living a comfortable enough lifestyle, so they sell their sperm. An act of desperation? In need of cash? What kind of people are donating their sperm. If I was sterile, and my wife wanted a child, I wouldn’t go to the local liquor store, find a bum and ask him to blow a load in my wife. No thank you. I’d try and find the most intelligent person I can find.

I mean sure there’s a process for selecting the right donor. But I’m sure the list isn’t that huge, or varied for that matter.[/quote]

There are company’s that at least claim they sell sperm of very intelligent people. If you should trust them is a second questions.

Read full topic

What kind of people are donating their sperm. If I was sterile, and my wife wanted a child, I wouldn’t go to the local liquor store, find a bum and ask him to blow a load in my wife. No thank you. I’d try and find the most intelligent person I can find.

I mean sure there’s a process for selecting the right donor. But I’m sure the list isn’t that huge, or varied for that matter.

la­wl:

i wouldn’t donate my sperm, only sell

item.title: Sperm donation
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:2, topic:311626”]you get paid for donating at a sperm bank so yeah id do it, as long as it makes someone happy thats all that matters[/quote]You’re referring to yourself when you say “makes someone happy”, because of the money? Lol.

I would rather not deal with the possibility of meeting them in the future. I could see the conversation now:

“So you gave me away…?”
“Uhm… wut…”

item.title: Sperm donation
item.dc:creator: @Cbot Cbot
item.description:
@Cbot wrote:

I would probably do it, seeing as you would get paid for it (depending on sperm count, diseases, physical features, etc).
What are the chances of me finding “my” child in the future, which I wouldn’t even consider my child since I didn’t raise it.
At least I would know I’m making someone happy.

Read full topic

item.title: Sperm donation
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I wouldn’t donate to a heterosexual-couple I knew. I think that would seriously mess up your relationship with that couple, as technically it’s your child that guy is having fun with. I’d donate to a lesbian couple if they really wanted to. As for donating to a sperm bank, I’m not sure. It’s quite a simple procedure (fapfapfap) but it can overtime result in questions on both sides. What if I want to know who my child is? What if the child wants to know it’s father?

Read full topic
